name: Bayad Po!
description:
The game Bayad Po! is a Casual Arcade Math game where the player is put in the shoes of a jeepney driver where they are tasked to bring passengers to their destination while worrying about giving their change.

For better performance, please download the game.

ROLESMEMBERSGame DesignerXynkingAsst. DesignerToothpickLead ProgrammerSonOfBenProducer / ProgrammerbulletproofpancakeLead ArtistGriosArtist / SoundsRikachu
